decisions: Zod strict env with Secrets Manager fallback (USE_AWS_SECRETS=1 or prod).
CSP Report-Only in dev via next.config.mjs; enforce later per 0.4.
Middleware cookie-guard protects /dashboard until Step 17 auth.
next: 18A ΓÇö Job orchestration & idempotency (SQS + worker baseline).
19 ΓÇö Transcription pipeline skeleton (Whisper v3 stub) behind feature flag.
Wire CI check for typecheck/build on PRs.

title: Core App Architecture (Next.js + strict env + AWS Secrets + SSR dashboard)
decisions: Add zod + dotenv to satisfy env schema + dev .env load.
Keep CSP in Report-Only until hardening step.
next: 18A ΓÇö Job orchestration & idempotency (SQS + worker baseline).
19 ΓÇö Transcription pipeline skeleton behind feature flag.
CI: add typecheck/build job on PRs.

title: Core App Architecture (Next.js + strict env + AWS Secrets + SSR dashboard)
decisions: ESLint compliance without disabling rules.
Type-safe Secrets Manager utility returning Record<string,string>.
next: 18A ΓÇö SQS job orchestrator + idempotency baseline.
19 ΓÇö Transcription pipeline stub behind feature flag.
CI: add typecheck/build job on PRs.

title: Core App Architecture (Next.js + strict env + AWS Secrets + SSR dashboard)
decisions: Avoid base-to-string by JSON.stringify for non-strings; rely on control-flow narrowing for SecretBinary.
next: 18A ΓÇö SQS job orchestrator + idempotency baseline.
19 ΓÇö Transcription pipeline stub behind feature flag.
CI: add typecheck/build job on PRs.

title: Job orchestration & idempotency (SQS FIFO + enqueue API + worker)
decisions: Use SQS FIFO + MessageDeduplicationId for idempotency; group by job name.
Persist JOBS_QUEUE_URL in Secrets lifebook/{stage}/app.
next: 19 ΓÇö Transcription pipeline stub behind feature flag.
CI: gate PRs on typecheck/build.
Wire a simple job handler switch inside worker (e.g., 'transcribe').

title: 18A repair (SQS create/tag/redrive + zod + pkg script)
decisions: Avoid inline JSON quoting by using file:// for RedrivePolicy.
Tag queues with aws sqs tag-queue post-create for reliability on Windows.
next: Wire worker switch (e.g., 'transcribe') behind feature flag.
CI: add typecheck/build gate on PRs.

title: 18A finish (SQS tag via JSON + enqueue safeParse)
decisions: Use file:// JSON for SQS tag-queue to avoid CLI quoting issues on Windows.
Use zod.safeParse to guarantee typed body without eslint unsafe-assignment.
next: Add worker switch (e.g., 'transcribe') behind a feature flag.
CI: gate PRs on typecheck/build.

title: Transcription pipeline stub (feature-flagged)
decisions: Gate real STT behind FEATURE_TRANSCRIBE for safe rollout.
Add CI workflow to require typecheck/build on PRs.
next: 19A ΓÇö wire real STT path (Whisper v3) behind the flag.
20 ΓÇö job-level metrics & DLQ alarm (SQS/Lambda path).

title: Transcription pipeline stub ΓåÆ S3 request record (feature-flagged)
decisions: Persist STT requests in S3 (catalog/transcripts/requests) for audit/idempotency.
Keep FEATURE_TRANSCRIBE gate; no external STT call yet.
next: 19B ΓÇö wire actual Whisper v3 call; write transcript artifact to catalog/transcripts/results/.
20 ΓÇö job-level metrics + DLQ alarms.

title: Transcription stub ΓåÆ request+result artifacts (feature-flagged)
decisions: Record lifecycle: requests/* ΓåÆ results/*, update request with completion + link.
Keep the real STT call behind FEATURE_TRANSCRIBE until 19C.
next: 19C ΓÇö replace stub with real Whisper v3 call (adapter), same result contract.
20 ΓÇö add SQS DLQ alarm + basic job metrics (count, latency).

title: Transcription ΓåÆ OpenAI adapter (feature-flagged, dry-run if no key)
decisions: Introduce provider adapter layer: OpenAI primary, stub fallback if no key.
Keep behind FEATURE_TRANSCRIBE for controlled rollout.
next: 20 ΓÇö SQS DLQ alarm + basic job metrics (count/latency); wire into dashboard.
21 ΓÇö persist transcript ΓåÆ chapterizer/summary pipeline entry (stub first).

title: SQS alarms + dashboard + worker metrics
decisions: Alert on DLQ>0 (1 datapoint @60s) and backlog age>=300s (5/5 datapoints).
Emit basic job metrics from worker (Completed, LatencyMs) under Lifebook/Jobs.
next: 21 ΓÇö pipe transcript ΓåÆ chapterizer/summary (stub) writing to catalog/chapters & catalog/summaries.
22 ΓÇö PR gate: require CI green + alarms present (light policy check).

step: Phase 1 / Step 1 — Orchestrator DLQ + logs + verify
Phase 1 / Step 1 — Orchestrator DLQ + logs + verify

summary: CloudTrail Lake used to audit lifebook-orchestrator-queue; confirmed only expected roles touched the queue in the last ~30 minutes.

details.notes: Built PS7 formatter for CloudTrail Lake QueryResultRows (eventTime, eventName, uiType, principal, sourceIPAddress, queueUrl).

nextActions: Optionally promote this ad-hoc probe into infra/ops/orchestrator/who-touched-queue.ps1 for reuse.

next: Wire orchestrator worker + EventBridge so queue starts seeing real principals.
Later tighten allowlist once normal producers are finalized.
Model worker Lambda + DLQ + EventBridge rules in orchestrator Terraform stack.
Wire worker + queue health into orchestrator CI once Lambda exists.
Decide S3 bucket/key for orchestrator worker artifact and wire via CI.
Once artifact path is real, run terraform plan/apply for orchestrator stack.
Then wire EventBridge producers that enqueue work into lifebook-orchestrator-queue.
Relax ignore_changes for Lambda + role once orchestrator worker deploy is fully under CI.
Add orchestrator queue/Lambda health checks + alarms (DLQ, age, backlog) and wire into CI status.
Document orchestrator contract (job table, payload format, retries) in Master Sheet appendix.
